overview:
As the CEO & Founder of Bridge Global IT Staffing, I support software companies in their growth. International outsourcing – outsourcing work – is the driving force behind this.

My colleagues and I are steadily building a worldwide network of profitable (IT-) companies. We scout the world for precious talent like real explorers.

Many people wonder if hiring IT programmers or designers offshore is a good idea and whether it is suitable for their company. Questions arise:

✔Do the advantages outweigh the costs? ✔How do I develop my processes? ✔How do I develop a clear strategy? ✔Is Eastern Europe a better choice than India or not? ✔Can we outsource as a smaller company? ✔How do I manage people from a distance?

I am convinced that international IT outsourcing offers many organizations a comfortable and profitable prospect. Not just financially but also personally.

I first knew that I wanted to start a company that would contribute to reducing poverty around the world when I was in India a few years ago. I am very proud that I succeeded. Because of outsourcing the employment rate in developing countries increases.
